name: Social Contact Photo Sync
description: Synchronise your phone contacts with high resolution photos from social networks and partly even from social apps:  ************************* * FULL AUTOMATICALLY *************************  * GooglePlus (full automatically) * Twitter (full automatically) * Instagram (full automatically) * Ordner-Modus (full automatically auto sync with a picture file in a predefined folder) * VKontakte (vk.com) * URL-Modus (full automatically auto sync with a picture file at a predefined website url) * Xing (full automatically)  ************************* * FULL AUTOMATICALLY (OR MANUAL INTERACTION NECESSARY FOR ADDING FRIENDS) *************************  * Facebook (full automatically, but ONLY on ROOTED phones and with the OFFICIAL FACEBOOK OR MESSENGER APP installed, you have to MANUALLY add your friends if you do not have root)  ************************* * MANUAL INTERACTION NECESSARY *************************  * Hike (semi-automatically: contact pictures have to be downloaded in Hike manually, otherwise the app does not know about the contact, the rest is done by the app)  ************************* * SETTING A PICTURE ONLY *************************  * WhatsApp - only a manual process is supported  -------------------------- FUNCTIONS --------------------------  The app automatically keeps phone contact pictures synchronised with pictures from social networks. A few settings are possible as well: * define when and how often an auto sync is started * define which preconditions are necessray before starting an auto sync (like for example, that the auto sync should only be started if WIFI is available) * enable an image history and setup how many images should be remembered * define the folder for the image history and for the folder mode  -------------------------- TUTORIALS --------------------------  General Tutorial: http://www.michaelflisar.com/social-contact-photo-sync/ Facebook ADDITONAL Tutorial: http://www.michaelflisar.com/social-contact-photo-sync-facebook-tutorial/  -------------------------- VARIOUS --------------------------  Something missing? Simple give me some feedback through the app (with answer mail address). I can implement other networks as well, if desired.  ---------------------------------------- Rights: ----------------------------------------  1) contacts/profile * READ_PROFILE for showing the own profile * READ_CONTACTS/WRITE_CONTACTS for reading and writing contacts (updating the contact pictures) * GET_ACCOUNTS... for logging in with already existing accounts like google play for example  2) storage * READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE for reading WhatsApp/Viber pictures * WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE... for the pciture history  3) network * INTERNET/ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE for reading pictures from social networks  4) others RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED/WAKE_LOCK for auto updating pictures (so no service is required, this saves battery)  5) google * BILLING... for buying the full version  6) Debug * READ_LOGS... for reading the log file
